entry.summary:
Vendor: M2 Marino
Type: Disposables
Price: 12.99

M2 Marino - WF-7003 Caution Wet Floor Sign English/French- Each

This is the perfect cost effective Wet Floor Sign to equip all your janitorial carts. All the features required for management of wet areas in large communal spaces (restrooms, lobbies, airports etc.). In the case pack for all your cleaning crews needs.

  • Wet floor sign is two sided and 28" tall. Bright yellow floor signs communicate the necessary warning message to help maintain safety.
  • 28 1/2" x 12 3/4" x 9"
  • Folds for convenient storage
  • Specially contoured feet to minimize contact with floor to floor finishes
  • Professional quality, two-sided signs in English & FrenchÂ 
  • Durable polypropylene for rugged, long service life
  • BPA free
  • Prevent injuries with clear identification
  • High resistance to electricity, chemicals, and mildew
  • Long lasting, durable polypropylene

Vendor: Liao

Price: 8.99

LIAO - Twist Mop - Microfiber Grey Refill 128cm Metal Handle - Each

Liao wet mop with its super-absorbent microfiber deep cleanses the floor and gives it a mirror-like finish. Suitable for all kind of floors, its scrubber removes even the most stubborn stains, without leaving behind any lint. This twist mop comes with a comfortable grip and a refill that is easy to replace. Whether it comes to performance, efficiency or convenience, Liao Wet Mop is always a step ahead from ordinary mops.Â
